description: Main source code for a Flutter-based notes app, including UI components, state management via providers, model definitions, database interactions using sqflite, and search functionality.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Model representing a single note with id, title, content, and last update timestamp.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: State management class for handling notes array, database operations, and syncing logic.

classes.name: SettingsProvider
classes.description: State management class for app settings, e.g., dark mode toggle.

classes.name: NotesHomePage
classes.description: Main UI widget displaying list/grid of notes with search, add, delete, and sync controls.

classes.name: NoteEditorScreen
classes.description: Screen for creating and editing a note with form validation and save logic.

classes.name: NotesSearchDelegate
classes.description: Custom search delegate for searching notes within the app.

classes.name: NotesDrawer
classes.description: Navigation drawer UI providing options like sync, delete all, and theme toggle.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point initializing the Flutter app.

methods.name: Note.fromMap
methods.description: Creates a Note instance from a Map, typically retrieved from the database.

methods.name: Note.toMap
methods.description: Serializes a Note instance into a Map for database storage.

methods.name: NotesProvider.init
methods.description: Initializes the database and loads notes into state.

methods.name: NotesProvider.setSearchQuery
methods.description: Filters notes based on a search query.

methods.name: NotesProvider._loadNotes
methods.description: Fetches notes from the database.

methods.name: NotesProvider.addNote
methods.description: Adds a new note to database and internal list.

methods.name: NotesProvider.updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note in database and internal list.

methods.name: NotesProvider.deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by id.

methods.name: NotesProvider.getNoteById
methods.description: Fetches a single note by its id.

methods.name: NotesProvider.deleteAllNotes
methods.description: Removes all notes from database and internal list.

methods.name: NotesProvider.triggerSync
methods.description: Simulates synchronization (e.g., with a server).

methods.name: SettingsProvider.toggleDarkMode
methods.description: Toggles dark mode setting.

methods.name: NotesHomePage.build
methods.description: Builds the main screen with notes list, search, add, delete, and sync actions.

methods.name: _openNoteEditor
methods.description: Navigates to the note creation/edit screen.

methods.name: _confirmDelete
methods.description: Displays confirmation dialog before deleting a note.

methods.name: NoteCard.build
methods.description: UI for individual note item in list or grid.

methods.name: NoteEditorScreen.build
methods.description: UI for creating or editing a note, with form validation and save logic.

methods.name: _onSave
methods.description: Handler for saving a note, either new or edited.

methods.name: NotesSearchDelegate.buildResults
methods.description: Builds search results list based on query.

methods.name: NotesSearchDelegate.buildSuggestions
methods.description: Builds search suggestions list.

methods.name: NotesDrawer.build
methods.description: Builds the navigation drawer with options for sync, delete all, etc.
